channel.title: Blast door stuck
channel.description:
The blast doors get stuck while closing if there is an indestructible prop stuck underneath them. That makes it impossible to get past them without noclipping.
Status output for one of the doors where the problem occurs: [quote] m_c1a3b at: -1397 x, -1471 y, -31 z [/quote] Getpos output: [quote] -1397.531372 -1471.984253 -31.968750;setang 19.875792 -89.338692 0.000000 [/quote] Screenshot [img]https://84.32.118.61/pliki/2012-09-14_00001.jpg[/img]

item.title: Blast door stuck
item.dc:creator: MaTi
item.description:
The blast doors get stuck while closing if there is an indestructible prop stuck underneath them. That makes it impossible to get past them without noclipping.

Status output for one of the doors where the problem occurs:

m_c1a3b at: -1397 x, -1471 y, -31 z
